title: Connect Seamlessly Across the Globe with Mexico
meta_description: Get connected instantly in Mexico with Pirate Mobile’s eSIM. No physical SIM required! Enjoy seamless data and voice services with easy activation.

faqs.question: Can I use the Mexico eSIM for both data and voice calls?
faqs.answer: Pirate Mobile’s Mexico eSIM primarily provides data services, but some plans may include SMS and voice calls. Check the plan details to see what's included.

faqs.question: Is my phone compatible with the Mexico eSIM?
faqs.answer: Most newer smartphones, including iPhone XS and later models, Samsung Galaxy, and Google Pixel, are compatible with eSIMs. Check your phone settings under 'Cellular' to confirm eSIM support.

faqs.question: How do I activate the Mexico eSIM?
faqs.answer: After purchasing from Pirate Mobile, you will receive a QR code. Scan it with your device to activate the eSIM. Make sure your phone is connected to Wi-Fi during the setup process.

faqs.question: Can I keep my physical SIM while using the Mexico eSIM?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can use both your physical SIM and the eSIM simultaneously, giving you the flexibility of dual SIM functionality for international travel and staying connected locally.

faqs.question: What if I accidentally delete my Mexico eSIM?
faqs.answer: If you delete the eSIM from your device, contact Pirate Mobile for assistance. Depending on your provider's policies, you may be able to reinstall the eSIM or receive a new activation code.
